meta.title: Contact | Jacek Janczura
meta.description: Get in touch for AI architecture reviews, advisory, and delivery engagements. Available for enterprise AI platform design and technical leadership.

intro: Pick the fastest way below. I’m open to advisory, architecture reviews, and select delivery engagements focused on enterprise AI platforms.

primaryCta.title: Want to talk this week?
primaryCta.description: The fastest path is a short call. If you prefer, send a message with context and I’ll follow up.

bookCall.title: Book a call
bookCall.description: Pick a slot that works for you. Opens the calendar in a new tab.

github.title: GitHub
github.description: For open source contributions and technical discussions.

message.title: Send a message
message.description: Share a short problem statement, constraints (security/compliance), and timeline expectations.

items.title: AI Platform Architecture
items.description: Multi-tenant LLM platforms, RAG systems, and AI pipeline design

items.title: Technical Leadership
items.description: Team building, code review culture, and delivery process optimization

items.title: Security & Compliance
items.description: ISO 27001/SOC 2 implementation and AI-specific risk assessment

items.title: System Design
items.description: Event-driven microservices, distributed systems, and performance optimization

cta.text1: I work with startups, growing companies, and enterprises building AI solutions that require robust architecture, security-first design, and scalable implementation.
cta.text2: Currently focusing on LLM platform development, prompt engineering at scale, and AI governance frameworks.
